comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Honest-to-God, I'm actually sick of running those tours. At first it seemed like a good idea; the money was good, I could write my own schedule, and I got to spend a lot of time outdoors. But, the expectations! Oy! As you know, I'm useless at conversation, small, large, or in-between. And the hygiene requirements had me buffaloed. All that scrubbing! Sooo... after this next tour I'm finished. Anyone want the franchise? Lemme know. Make you a deal. DU
